StringVectorProperty.name: AaaFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Reads in points from a Ramses binary file.

IntVectorProperty.name: DistributeDataOn
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This option is only relevant when running in parallel on multiple processors. If checked, after Ramses file is read in, data is redistributed across processors to maximize spatial locality. This step takes additional time, and can instead be run manually by executing the D3 filter, some filters require this or D3 to be run, due to optimal performance under spatial locality or requirement of ghost cells

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.
